name: Self-Made Technology
description:
You have to help the black little robot to build other robots. 3 machines create robot parts and another assembles parts. The parts are lost in a labyrinth.  

You a have to find them and assemble them.

You begin the game next to the machine that assemble robots parts .

Commands : 

********

Move : Click where you want to go !

Zoom : Scroll wheel ...

Move Camera : Move the mouse ...

Stop camera  movement  + Stop Zoom / Restart camera movement + Restart Zoom : Shift ...

********

This is a Mini Jam 15 Game. You can rate this game here, if you want : https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-15-technology/rate/332346

Have a good game !
